sI#daq varu#NO&si dhRuqtavra#tO vAruqNama#si Saqm~MyOrdEqvAnA(gm)# saqKyAnmA dEqvAnA#-maqpasa#SCithsmaqhyApa#tayE tvAgRuhNAmiq pari#patayE tvA gRuhNAmiq tanUqnaptrE$ tvAgRuhNAmi SAkvaqrAya# tvA gRuhNAmiq Sakmaqn-nOji#ShThAya tvA gRuhNAqmya -nA#dhRuShTamasya-nAdhRuqShyaM dEqvAnAqmOjO#&BiSastiqpA a#naBiSastEq&nyamanu# mE dIqkShAM dIqkShApa#ti rmanyatAqmanuq tapaqstapa#spatiqra~jja#sA saqtyamupa# gESha(gm) suviqtE mA# ( ) dhAH || 19
